channel.title: Fixing a statement
channel.description:
I recently decompiled my Class8 file and then i compile and i get an error with this line:
[code] if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1[/code]
My error is:
[code]Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: not a statement if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: 'else' without 'if' if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: ';' expected if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1[/code]
Help much appreciated.

item.title: Fixing a statement
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:3, topic:262509”]Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; ^ Class8.java:42: not a statement if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; ^ Class8.java:44: illegal start of expression if (i <= 7955) goto _L1; ^ Class8.java:44: not a statement if (i <= 7955) goto _L1; ^ Class8.java:47: not a statement Class8; class8; ^ Class8.java:47: not a statement Class8; class8; ^ Class8.java:128: not a statement ioexception1; ^ Class8.java:139: not a statement exception; ^ Class8.java:148: illegal start of expression goto _L3 ^ Class8.java:149: ';' expected _L2: ^ Class8.java:5425: reached end of file while parsing private boolean aBoolean206; ^ 11 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Class8.java:149: ';' expected _L2: ^

try changing : to ;

those are all my errors[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing a statement
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; ^ Class8.java:42: not a statement if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; ^ Class8.java:44: illegal start of expression if (i <= 7955) goto _L1; ^ Class8.java:44: not a statement if (i <= 7955) goto _L1; ^ Class8.java:47: not a statement Class8; class8; ^ Class8.java:47: not a statement Class8; class8; ^ Class8.java:128: not a statement ioexception1; ^ Class8.java:139: not a statement exception; ^ Class8.java:148: illegal start of expression goto _L3 ^ Class8.java:149: ';' expected _L2: ^ Class8.java:5425: reached end of file while parsing private boolean aBoolean206; ^ 11 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

those are all my errors

item.title: Fixing a statement
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

Class8.java:42: ‘else’ without ‘if’
if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
if(i >= 7955) goto_L2; elseIf goto _L1 < That might work.

Class8.java:42: ‘;’ expected
if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1

    if(i >= 7955); goto _L2; else goto _L1 < That should work.
  • RuneX -

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing a statement
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I recently decompiled my Class8 file and then i compile and i get an error with this line:

        if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1

My error is:

Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: not a statement if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: 'else' without 'if' if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: illegal start of expression if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:42: ';' expected if(i >= 7955) goto _L2; else goto _L1

Help much appreciated.
